Languages: Sylvan, understands Common but cannot speak

Traits.Name: Urban Haunter
Traits.Content: The Ki Sumashi has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made in urban environments.

Traits.Name: Vengeful Guardian
Traits.Content: When the Ki Sumashi takes damage, it can use its reaction to gain temporary hit points equal to the damage taken (up to a maximum of 50 temporary hit points).

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content: The Ki Sumashi's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: druidcraft, entangle, thorn whip; 3/day each: misty step, barkskin, hold person.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Ki Sumashi makes two attacks with Vine Strike.

Actions.Name: Vine Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be grappled.

Actions.Name: Nature's Wrath (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The Ki Sumashi calls forth the fury of the natural world. All creatures within a 15 ft. radius must make a DC 16 Strength saving throw, taking 18 (4d6) bludgeoning damage on a failed save and be knocked prone, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Actions.Name: Wrath of the Forest
Actions.Content: The Ki Sumashi unleashes a wave of energy from its body as wood splinters and roots erupt from the ground. Each creature of its choice within a 20 ft. radius must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 30 (4d12 + 4) piercing damage on a failed save and becoming immobilized until the end of its next turn, or half as much damage on a successful one. This ability can be used once, and then requires completion of a short or long rest to reuse.
